QuestData.Title: Warspear Welcome
QuestData.Description: Lieutenant Kragil said you might be showing up.$b$bI've been ordered to take you to the inn.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lieutenant Kragil at Warspear in Ashran.
QuestData.RewardText: Throm-Ka, commander. I am pleased to finally meet you in person.
